sentence: The room was huge and comfortable

We booked the Rouge Suite for my sisters bachelorette party over the weekend because we wanted a nice room for the girls to get ready together in and then for a couple of us to sleep in after dancing in DC
The rooms were very spacious clean and modern
The room is exactly as pictured pretty sexy and stylish
Nice hotel very well located very spacious room
I was also taking a mini vacation after a work trip so double pre arrival excitement
As full as the hotel was and being on a major street the room was surprisingly quiet
Our room had 2 queen size beds and twin sized bunk beds
Rooms are spacious and colorful
The room as you can guess from Kimptons is very eclectic with a black and white pillow on the bed with ruby red lips
The rooms are not especially clean and our room did not have freshly filled toiletries and the roll of toilet paper in the room was mostly used up when we checked in
No microwave and fridge to store or heat up my food
Bath rooms are very small and cramped
I will note that the rooms are definitely a little dated but it ’s what I ’ve experienced year after year
The breakfast was a little skimpy and the room was very warm despite being 65 on the thermostat
The finishes were showing wear the soap holder in my shower was taped to the wall with black tape
Gym room time with only 2 ecliptical machines 3 small dumbbells and a weight bench no treadmill no room to do yoga skip rope or do a box a ball workout
Also we did not need parking no car and there was no way we even wanted to consume anything in the refrigerator in the room
Furthermore in the ‘ new room ’ the shower head was leaking so much it was almost impossible to shower in
However about an hour after we checked in someone used a keycard to walk into our room claiming that they had been checked into the same room by the staff downstairs
